signs.start_location: Side of the face, near the eye.
signs.end_location: Side of the face, near the chin.
signs.movement_description: Place the open hand near the top of your face with the palm facing you. Move the hand straight down the length of your face while wiggling or fluttering your fingers.
signs.source_description: Wiggle the fingers and move the hand down the face.

signs.dominant_handshape: Index finger extended from a fist.
signs.start_location: Top of chin, just below the lip.
signs.movement_description: Touch the tip of the index finger to the chin and drag it straight down once.
signs.contact_point: Tip of the index finger slides along the chin.
signs.source_description: Move the index finger down your chin.

signs.start_location: In front of the signing-side shoulder.
signs.movement_description: Hold the 'B' hand up and shake it back and forth from the wrist.
signs.source_description: Shake the 'B' hand at the wrist.

signs.start_location: In front of the signing-side shoulder.
signs.movement_description: Hold the 'G' hand up and shake it back and forth from the wrist.
signs.source_description: Shake the 'G' hand at the wrist.

signs.start_location: In front of the signing-side shoulder.
signs.movement_description: Hold the 'Y' hand up and shake it back and forth from the wrist.
signs.source_description: Shake the 'Y' hand at the wrist.

signs.movement_description: Hold a loose 'S' or clawed hand in front of the mouth. Repeatedly squeeze the hand open and closed as if squeezing an orange.
signs.source_description: Slightly open and squeeze the 'S' hand in front of your mouth.

signs.movement_description: Place the index finger of the 'P' hand on your temple. Rotate your hand at the wrist.
signs.source_description: Place the index finger of the 'P' hand on your temple and rotate your hand at the wrist.

signs.movement_description: Place the index finger of the 'V' hand on your temple and tap it a few times.
signs.source_description: Place the index finger of the 'V' hand on your temple and tap a few times.

signs.movement_description: Brush the tip of the middle finger of the 'P' hand down across your lips.
signs.source_description: Move the middle finger of the 'P' hand down your lips.

signs.palm_orientation: Dominant palm down, Non-dominant palm up.
signs.start_location: In front of the body, hands together.
signs.movement_description: Place the palm of the dominant 'B' hand on top of the palm of the non-dominant 'B' hand. Rub them together in a circular motion.
signs.contact_point: Palms of both hands are in contact.
signs.source_description: Rub the 'B' hands together in a circular motion.

signs.dominant_handshape: Index finger extended from a fist.
signs.movement_description: With the index finger pointing to the side, move it straight across your forehead from one side to the other.
signs.contact_point: Side of the index finger maintains contact with the forehead.
signs.source_description: Move the index finger sideways across your forehead.

signs.dominant_handshape: Open Hand transitioning to AND Hand
signs.movement_description: Start with an open, flat hand on your chest. Pull the hand forward, away from the body, while closing your fingertips and thumb together into an 'AND' hand shape.
signs.source_description: Open the hand on your chest and pull forward into the 'AND' hand.
